attachments.displayName:
Pink Roses
Give a pink flower is the way, through flowers,
thank a major favor.
It also means the appreciation we have for someone.
The pink carries with it the meaning of absence
malice, i.e. There is no no double intention
the person offering them is. For this reason, the person
that gives this bouquet of flowers is legit.
If the color of the flower bouquet is pink soft,
It means admiration and sympathy.
Sweet weekend! :))

object.content:
Pink Roses
Give a pink flower is the way, through flowers,
thank a major favor.
It also means the appreciation we have for someone.
The pink carries with it the meaning of absence
malice, i.e. There is no no double intention
the person offering them is. For this reason, the person
that gives this bouquet of flowers is legit.
If the color of the flower bouquet is pink soft,
It means admiration and sympathy.
Sweet weekend! :))
